page.title: 11My School
page.content:
I go to Saint Richard Gwyn High School in Flint, I am in the first year and study various subjects.
The main lessons are English and Maths we have five thirty-five minute periods of each during the week. As my school is in North Wales we have Welsh lessons each week, we also study French. I find French more enjoyable than Welsh, which is a waste of time. My favourite lesson is science, we do many different things which I find enjoyable like testing soil. We have Combined Studies, Games and Physical Education. In winter we play netball and hockey in summer rounders and athletics. My school is catholic so we have assemblies on Monday, Thursday and Friday. We have religious lessons as well. A school day lasts about 6 hours and is very tiring.
